message: I'm looking to create a series of mii-like avatars for a site, and need to create a bunch of 2d pieces. Lots of eyes, mouthes, face structures, etc. 99 designs doesn't seem like a great fit, since it would be a LOT of work for a "non-accepted" user to do.
I've had good luck just browsing around on dribbble.com, finding someone who's work i liked, and asking if they do freelance work.
@e1ven I can handle that ;) Here is my email design@kaish.in if you are still interested.

check out http://graphicriver.net/ You might even find good stock kits for what you need. If not ask the designers there, if you are flexible with licensing you might be able to get custom artwork for a very low price
